title: Hextech loot on server transfers
body:
The Hextech FAQ says loot isn't transferred on server switches. Is it still so?

>One important note: if you use Hextech Crafting or loot, anything you unlock (shards, essence, even permanent content that you craft) using the new system WILL NOT transfer with you if you leave the server. Weâ€™re planning to remove this restriction once all regions have Hextech Crafting.

replies.body:
Hextech loot **does** transfer with you now, however, back when Hextech first launched, it wasn't on all Regions, therefore transferring content back then wasn't possible. You can find more about Account transfers in this [**FAQ.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
